title: Print, "Invitation to The First Graduation of Communist Specialists in Polygraphy and Publishing, July 24, 1931", 1931
inscribed: Imprinted in brown ink, lower left, publication information
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Lucy Work Hewitt
description: Invitation in brown and orange ink. Left side has brown text on orange ground; right side has brown and orange text  on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Invitation to The First Graduation of Communist Specialists in Polygraphy and Publishing, July 24, 1931", 1931.
1931. Lithograph, typography on paper. Museum purchase through gift of Lucy Work Hewitt. 1992-167-4.
